channel.title: Posts on PraxisLIVE Unofficial Guide
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on PraxisLIVE Unofficial Guide

item.title: Tutorial 4 Available!
item.description: Hello everyone! The third episode about Audio-Reactive Visuals is available right now! Click here!
item.content: Hello everyone! The third episode about Audio-Reactive Visuals is available right now! Click here!

item.title: Upcoming website upgrades and extra episode!
item.description: I’m glad to announce that when the basic tutorial series will be over, I’ll add a plugin called Disqus, which will allow you on all my posts and tutorials to comment and let me know your thoughts and advices (or doubts if something wasn’t clear). The other new is that an extra episode about other little things I might have left and that will improve our project. By the way I will create a GitHub repository that will store all the projects made here.
item.content: I’m glad to announce that when the basic tutorial series will be over, I’ll add a plugin called Disqus, which will allow you on all my posts and tutorials to comment and let me know your thoughts and advices (or doubts if something wasn’t clear). The other new is that an extra episode about other little things I might have left and that will improve our project. By the way I will create a GitHub repository that will store all the projects made here. On the Website itself will be a dedicated page that will contain also extra links, tutorials and other stuff you might find useful. Thank you very much for your attention! See you at the next tutorial!

item.title: Tutorial 2 Available!
item.description: Hello everyone! I’m sorry if this episode came a bit late, I had to transfer from Manjaro to Windows 10 and it shall be temporary. To recover the time lost, this episode will cover parts of what should have been in the third one. Let’s go! Click here!
item.content: Hello everyone! I’m sorry if this episode came a bit late, I had to transfer from Manjaro to Windows 10 and it shall be temporary. To recover the time lost, this episode will cover parts of what should have been in the third one. Let’s go! Click here!

item.title: Tutorial 1 Available!
item.description: Hello, everyone! So, it seems that our introduction got your attention! You’ll be glad to know that a new part of our basic series is ready! Let’s get started! Click here!

item.title: Welcome to PraxisLIVE Unofficial Guide
item.description: We are glad to open this blog, which will host info, updates, guides and new nodes developped by us!
item.content: We are glad to open this blog, which will host info, updates, guides and new nodes developped by us!
